alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:55AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harrison County through 830 AM CDT... At 755 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gulfport, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, D`iberville, Lyman and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 30 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
